Math

Here’s some math \(y = mx + b\) inside a paragraph.

Here’s some math in display mode:

\[y = mx + b\]

Here’s how to do a bunch of math expressions:

  • Vector: \(\langle x, y \rangle\)
  • Sum: \(\sum_{i=1}^n c = cn\)
  • Infinity symbol: \(\infty\)
  • Squared: \(x^2\)
  • Less than: \(\leq\)
